Subskills.name: Forming Storm
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bone projectiles.

Subskills.name: Razor Sharp
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Cycloning Bones
Subskills.description: Chance to summon a small cyclone of bones on hit.

Subskills.name: Demonic Winds
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of bone projectiles.

Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by bone storm.

Subskills.name: Infiltrate their Core
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Devils Favourite
Subskills.description: Chance to knock monsters back on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bone Devils
Subskills.description: Summons small bone devils at target location.

Subskills.name: Spontanious Dislocation
Subskills.description: Bone Storm has a chance on hit to summon additional Bone Fragments in random directions.

Subskills.name: Storm Influx
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of bone storm.

Subskills.name: Devils Diversion
Subskills.description: Gain increased chance to dodge attacks for a short period when casting bone storm.

Subskills.name: Bone Tornado
Subskills.description: Unleash a bone tornado towards target location with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Everlasting Storm
Subskills.description: Bone storm no longer expires but it only deals a portion of its damage.
